items.title: Goldman Sachs Group (NYSE:GS) Sees 13% Drop Last Week Amid COO Appointment
items.description: Goldman Sachs Group (NYSE:GS) experienced significant stock volatility last week, marked by a 13% decline. This downturn coincided with the company's announcement of David Dubner's appointment as COO of Global Mergers and Acquisitions, a move aimed at bolstering their executive team. Additionally, Goldman Sachs communicated the early redemption of a substantial debt issuance, indicating effective balance sheet management. However, broader market dynamics, including a 5% drop in major indices...
